profileAlternative.name: Suzie Lu
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Lyft
profileAlternative.summary:
Nimble problem solver with proven success of adding business value by leveraging innovative analytical methodologies, extensive ecommerce experience in leading and influencing corporate strategic initiatives by providing actionable data insights.

- Equipped with track record of success in influencing and driving strategies by discovering and analyzing customer behavior through various data sources and platforms
- Strong project management skills and collaborative work style to guarantee the quality deliverables and develop the long-term partnership
- Excellent data visualization and presentation skills
- Proven success in developing, managing and mentoring a high performing team, excel in both individual contributor and manager roles
- Fast adopter, solid history of striving in agile, fast paced environment


Specialties:
Financial Analysis, Customer Behavior and Insights, Predictive Modeling and Forecasting, Project Management, Strategic Planning, Analytical Solutions and BI Tool Building, Reporting and Data Visualization, Statistical Analysis, Partnership Development

Tools:
Excel and other Microsoft Office Applications, Oracle DB, SQL Server, Teradata, Netezza, Tableau, Business Object, Omniture Site Catalyst, Hive, Shell Scripting
